name: Christmas Gift (3dlakshan)
description:
this game is done for the yogscast game jam. 

the theme for the game is "giving"  this game done within 30 hours time.  i hope you enjoyed the game.

the game task is to  deliver gift to the kid. Santa can't deliver the gifts he send the gits inside the balloons we have to shoot the balloon with the snow balls. after gift lands dog is take the gift and take it to the house. 

game still in progress......
